verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden צֹ֑ר <WH6865> of Tyre הֵילִ֣ילוּ ׀ <WH3213> Howl אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> ye ships תַּרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <WH8659> of Tarshish כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שֻׁדַּ֤ד <WH7703> for it is laid waste מִבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> so that there is no house מִבּ֔וֹא <WH935> no entering in מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> from the land כִּתִּ֖ים <WH3794> of Chittim נִגְלָה־ <WH1540> it is revealed לָֽמוֹ׃

דֹּ֖מּוּ <WH1826> Be still יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> ye inhabitants אִ֑י <WH339> of the isle סֹחֵ֥ר <WH5503> thou whom the merchants צִיד֛וֹן <WH6721> of Zidon עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> that pass over יָ֖ם <WH3220> the sea מִלְאֽוּךְ׃ <WH4390> have replenished

וּבְמַ֤יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> And by great זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> the seed שִׁחֹ֔ר <WH7883> of Sihor קְצִ֥יר <WH7105> the harvest יְא֖וֹר <WH2975> of the river תְּבֽוּאָתָ֑הּ <WH8393> [is] her revenue וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> is a סְחַ֥ר <WH5505> and she is a mart גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of nations

בּ֣וֹשִׁי <WH954> Be thou ashamed צִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> O Zidon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> hath spoken יָ֔ם <WH3220> for the sea מָע֥וֹז <WH4581> [even] the strength הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have neither חַ֣לְתִּי <WH2342> I travail וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יָלַ֗דְתִּי <WH3205> not nor bring forth children וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have neither גִדַּ֛לְתִּי <WH1431> neither do I nourish up בַּחוּרִ֖ים <WH970> young men רוֹמַ֥מְתִּי <WH7311> [nor] bring up בְתוּלֽוֹת׃ <WH1330> virgins

כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שֵׁ֖מַע <WH8088> As at the report לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> concerning Egypt יָחִ֖ילוּ <WH2342> [so] shall they be sorely pained כְּשֵׁ֥מַע <WH8088> at the report צֹֽר׃ <WH6865> of Tyre
עִבְר֖וּ <WH5674> Pass ye over תַּרְשִׁ֑ישָׁה <WH8659> to Tarshish הֵילִ֖ילוּ <WH3213> howl יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> ye inhabitants אִֽי׃ <WH339> of the isle

הֲזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise לָכֶ֖ם עַלִּיזָ֑ה <WH5947> [Is] this your joyous מִֽימֵי־ <WH3117> age קֶ֤דֶם <WH6924> [is] of ancient קַדְמָתָהּ֙ <WH6927> [city] whose antiquity יֹבִל֣וּהָ <WH2986> shall carry רַגְלֶ֔יהָ <WH7272> feet מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> her afar off לָגֽוּר׃ <WH1481> to sojourn

מִ֚י <WH4310> Who יָעַ֣ץ <WH3289> Who hath taken this counsel זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise עַל־ <WH5921> against צֹ֖ר <WH6865> against Tyre הַמַּֽעֲטִירָ֑ה <WH5849> the crowning אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Whose סֹחֲרֶ֙יה֙ <WH5503> [city] whose merchants שָׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> [are] princes כִּנְעָנֶ֖יהָ <WH3669> Canaanite נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <WH3513> [are] the honourable אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> common

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יְעָצָ֑הּ <WH3289> hath purposed לְחַלֵּל֙ <WH2490> it to stain גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> the pride כָּל־ <WH3605> of all צְבִ֔י <WH6643> of all glory לְהָקֵ֖ל <WH7043> [and] to bring into contempt כָּל־ <WH3605> all נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <WH3513> all the honourable אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

עִבְרִ֥י <WH5674> Pass אַרְצֵ֖ךְ <WH776> through thy land כַּיְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> as a river בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter תַּרְשִׁ֕ישׁ <WH8659> of Tarshish אֵ֖ין <WH369> There מֵ֥זַח <WH4206> [there is] no more strength עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more

יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand נָטָ֣ה <WH5186> He stretched out עַל־ <WH5921> over הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> over the sea הִרְגִּ֖יז <WH7264> he shook מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <WH4467> the kingdoms יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> hath given a commandment אֶל־ <WH413> concerning כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> against the merchant לַשְׁמִ֖ד <WH8045> [city] to destroy מָעֻזְנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH4581> the strong

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תוֹסִ֥יפִי <WH3254> Thou shalt no more ע֖וֹד <WH5750> You לַעְל֑וֹז <WH5937> rejoice הַֽמְעֻשָּׁקָ֞ה <WH6231> O thou oppressed בְּתוּלַ֣ת <WH1330> virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter צִיד֗וֹן <WH6721> of Zidon [כִּתִּיִּים כ] (כִּתִּים֙ <WH3794> Chittim ק) ק֣וּמִי <WH6965> arise עֲבֹ֔רִי <WH5674> pass over גַּם־ <WH1571> even שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָנ֥וּחַֽ <WH5117> there also shalt thou have no rest לָֽךְ׃

הֵ֣ן ׀ <WH2005> Behold אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> Behold the land כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans זֶ֤ה <WH2088> he הָעָם֙ <WH5971> this people לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> was not אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> was not [till] the Assyrian יְסָדָ֣הּ <WH3245> founded לְצִיִּ֑ים <WH6728> it for them that dwell in the wilderness הֵקִ֣ימוּ <WH6965> they set up [בְחִינָיו כ] (בַחוּנָ֗יו <WH971> tower ק) עֹרְרוּ֙ <WH6209> thereof they raised up אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH759> the palaces שָׂמָ֖הּ <WH7760> thereof [and] he brought לְמַפֵּלָֽה׃ <WH4654> it to ruin
הֵילִ֖ילוּ <WH3213> Howl אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> ye ships תַּרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <WH8659> of Tarshish כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <WH7703> is laid waste מָעֻזְּכֶֽן׃ <WH4581> for your strength ס

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will happen בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְנִשְׁכַּ֤חַת <WH7911> shall be forgotten צֹר֙ <WH6865> that Tyre שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> seventy שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years כִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> according to the days מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> of one מִקֵּ֞ץ <WH7093> after the end שִׁבְעִ֤ים <WH7657> of seventy שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will happen לְצֹ֔ר <WH6865> shall Tyre כְּשִׁירַ֖ת <WH7892> sing הַזּוֹנָֽה׃ <WH2181> as an harlot

קְחִ֥י <WH3947> Take כִנּ֛וֹר <WH3658> an harp סֹ֥בִּי <WH5437> go about עִ֖יר <WH5892> the city זוֹנָ֣ה <WH2181> thou harlot נִשְׁכָּחָ֑ה <WH7911> that hast been forgotten הֵיטִ֤יבִי <WH3190> make sweet נַגֵּן֙ <WH5059> melody הַרְבִּי־ <WH7235> sing many שִׁ֔יר <WH7892> songs לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> that תִּזָּכֵֽרִי׃ <WH2142> that thou mayest be remembered

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> will come מִקֵּ֣ץ ׀ <WH7093> And it shall come to pass after the end שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> of seventy שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years יִפְקֹ֤ד <WH6485> will visit יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֔ר <WH6865> Tyre וְשָׁבָ֖ה <WH7725> and she shall turn לְאֶתְנַנָּ֑ה <WH868> to her hire וְזָֽנְתָ֛ה <WH2181> and shall commit fornication אֶת־ <WH854> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <WH4467> with all the kingdoms הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the world עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> will become סַחְרָ֜הּ <WH5504> And her merchandise וְאֶתְנַנָּ֗הּ <WH868> and her hire קֹ֚דֶשׁ <WH6944> shall be holiness לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> to the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֵֽאָצֵ֖ר <WH686> it shall not be treasured וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יֵֽחָסֵ֑ן <WH2630> nor laid up כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לַיֹּשְׁבִ֞ים <WH3427> shall be for them that dwell לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will become סַחְרָ֔הּ <WH5504> for her merchandise לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> to eat לְשָׂבְעָ֖ה <WH7654> sufficiently וְלִמְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH4374> clothing עָתִֽיק׃ <WH6266> and for durable פ
